1: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <sup>5329 </sup> <n>To the chief Musician</n> מִזְמ֥וֹר <sup>4210 </sup> <n>A Psalm</n> לְדָוִֽד׃ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> יַֽעַנְךָ֣ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>hear</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> בְּי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>thee in the day</n> צָרָ֑ה <sup>6869 </sup> <n>of trouble</n> יְ֝שַׂגֶּבְךָ֗ <sup>7682 </sup> <n>defend</n> שֵׁ֤ם ׀ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>the name</n> אֱלֹהֵ֬י <sup>430 </sup> <n>of the God</n> יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n>
2: יִשְׁלַֽח־ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>Send</n> עֶזְרְךָ֥ <sup>5828 </sup> <n>thee help</n> מִקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>from the sanctuary</n> וּ֝מִצִּיּ֗וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>thee out of Zion</n> יִסְעָדֶֽךָּ׃ <sup>5582 </sup> <n>and strengthen</n>
3: יִזְכֹּ֥ר <sup>2142 </sup> <n>Remember</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מִנְחֹתֶ֑ךָ <sup>4503 </sup> <n>all thy offerings</n> וְעוֹלָתְךָ֖ <sup>5930 </sup> <n>thy burnt sacrifice</n> יְדַשְּׁנֶ֣ה <sup>1878 </sup> <n>and accept</n> סֶֽלָה׃ <sup>5542 </sup> <n>Selah</n>
4: יִֽתֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Grant</n> לְךָ֥ כִלְבָבֶ֑ךָ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>thee according to thine own heart</n> וְֽכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עֲצָתְךָ֥ <sup>6098 </sup> <n>all thy counsel</n> יְמַלֵּֽא׃ <sup>4390 </sup> <n>and fulfil</n>
5: נְרַנְּנָ֤ה ׀ <sup>7442 </sup> <n>We will rejoice</n> בִּ֘ישׁ֤וּעָתֶ֗ךָ <sup>3444 </sup> <n>in thy salvation</n> וּבְשֵֽׁם־ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>and in the name</n> אֱלֹהֵ֥ינוּ <sup>430 </sup> <n>of our God</n> נִדְגֹּ֑ל <sup>1713 </sup> <n>we will set up [our] banners</n> יְמַלֵּ֥א <sup>4390 </sup> <n>fulfil</n> יְ֝הוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מִשְׁאֲלוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>4862 </sup> <n>all thy petitions</n>
6: עַתָּ֤ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> יָדַ֗עְתִּי <sup>3045 </sup> <n>Now know</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הוֹשִׁ֥יעַ ׀ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>saveth</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>I that the LORD</n> מְשִׁ֫יח֥וֹ <sup>4899 </sup> <n>his anointed</n> יַ֭עֲנֵהוּ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>he will hear</n> מִשְּׁמֵ֣י <sup>8064 </sup> <n>heaven</n> קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>him from his holy</n> בִּ֝גְבֻר֗וֹת <sup>1369 </sup> <n>strength</n> יֵ֣שַׁע <sup>3468 </sup> <n>with the saving</n> יְמִינֽוֹ׃ <sup>3225 </sup> <n>of his right hand</n>
7: אֵ֣לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>Some</n> בָ֭רֶכֶב <sup>7393 </sup> <n>Some [trust] in chariots</n> וְאֵ֣לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>and some</n> בַסּוּסִ֑ים <sup>5483 </sup> <n>and some in horses</n> וַאֲנַ֓חְנוּ ׀ <sup>587 </sup> <n>we</n> בְּשֵׁם־ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>the name</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵ֣ינוּ <sup>430 </sup> <n>our God</n> נַזְכִּֽיר׃ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>but we will remember</n>
8: הֵ֭מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>They</n> כָּרְע֣וּ <sup>3766 </sup> <n>They are brought down</n> וְנָפָ֑לוּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>and fallen</n> וַאֲנַ֥חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>we</n> קַּ֝֗מְנוּ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>but we are risen</n> וַנִּתְעוֹדָֽד׃ <sup>5749 </sup> <n>and stand upright</n>
9: יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>LORD</n> הוֹשִׁ֑יעָה <sup>3467 </sup> <n>Save</n> הַ֝מֶּ֗לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>let the king</n> יַעֲנֵ֥נוּ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>hear</n> בְיוֹם־ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>us when</n> קָרְאֵֽנוּ׃ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>we call</n>
